sqlUnit.name: input_select_page_test
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_n_menu t [ where t.name like ':name%']

sqlUnit.name: sub_system_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.url,t.icon, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.sys_type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='SYS_TYPE')) as systype, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, t.sort_order,t.create_time from t_n_sub_system t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: get_sub_system
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_sub_system t where t.state='1' order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: get_op_auths_byuri
sqlUnit.sql: select rr.op_auths from t_n_resource t,t_n_role_resource rr where t.id=rr.resource_id and t.uri=:uri and rr.role_id in(:roleIds)

sqlUnit.name: get_sql_resource_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.res_name,t.descr, (case when t.is_filter then '是' else '否' end) as isFilter, u.full_name,t.create_time, t.last_modify_time, (select full_name from t_n_user u where u.id = t.last_user_id) as lastUser from t_n_sql_resource t, t_n_user u where t.user_id=u.id [ and t.res_name like '%:name%' ] order by t.create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: query_assoc_user_sql_resource
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.create_time,t.descr,t.is_filter,t.res_name,t.sql_,u.full_name as user_id,t.last_modify_time,uf.full_name as last_user_id from t_n_user u, t_n_sql_resource t left join t_n_user uf on uf.id=t.last_user_id where t.user_id=u.id and t.id=:id
